title.en: A Prayer to Noble White Tārā

text.en: Brilliant white, with the vibrant vigor of a thousand moons,
text.en-trans: rabkar da zhün tong gi langtso chen

text.en: In your supreme form of major and minor marks, you are the destroyer of Māra, Lord of Death,
text.en-trans: tsenpé ku chok chidak dü chom ma

text.en: And bestower of the supreme siddhis of longevity and wisdom—
text.en-trans: tsé dang yeshe ngödrub chok terwa

text.en: Noble Tārā, Wish-Fulfilling Wheel, to you I pray!
